mapper.select:
select a.rawid as param_id, e.rawid as eqp_id, e.name as eqp_name, a.name, a.description, (select name from code_mst_pdm where code=a.param_type_cd and category='param_type' and used_yn='Y') as param_type_name, (select name from code_mst_pdm where code=a.unit_cd and category='unit_type' and used_yn='Y') as unit_name,
a.param_type_cd ,a.unit_cd ,a.parts_mst_rawid as parts_id ,parts.name as parts_name
,parse_index from param_mst_pdm a join eqp_mst_pdm e on a.eqp_mst_rawid = e.rawid left join parts_mst_pdm parts on parts.rawid = a.parts_mst_rawid where a.eqp_mst_rawid = #{eqpId} order by a.name

select e.eqp_id, e.name as eqp_name, a.*, b.eu, b.eu_type, c.rpm,d.alarm, d.warn from param_pdm a join eqp_pdm e on a.eqp_id = e.eqp_id left join param_common_pdm b on a.param_id = b.param_id left join manual_rpm_pdm c on a.param_id = c.param_id left join overall_spec_pdm d on a.param_id=d.param_id where a.eqp_id =#{eqpId}

select e.eqp_id, e.name as eqp_name, a.*, b.eu, b.eu_type, c.rpm, d.alarm, d.warn from param_pdm a join eqp_pdm e on a.eqp_id = e.eqp_id left join param_common_pdm b on a.param_id = b.param_id left join manual_rpm_pdm c on a.param_id = c.param_id left join overall_spec_pdm d on a.param_id=d.param_id where a.param_id =#{paramId}
select a.* from param_pdm a join eqp_pdm b on a.eqp_id = b.eqp_id where b.eqp_id = #{eqpId} and a.param_type = 10001
mapper.insert:
select seq_param_pdm.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into param_pdm(param_id, eqp_id, name, description, param_type) values(#{param_id}, #{eqp_id}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param_type})
insert into overall_spec_pdm(param_id, warn, alarm) values(#{param_id}, #{warn}, #{alarm})
insert into param_common_pdm(param_id, eu, eu_type) values(#{param_id}, #{eu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eu_type,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
